Seminar Description: This course will explore how the Brands incorporate the rhetoric and imagery of social movements in their marketing efforts. We will discuss the efficacy, impact, and ethical implications of such marketing strategies in an environment of increasing calls for corporate social responsibility.


Instructor: Elihu Walker, MBA, is a marketer, justice reform advocate, and educator. He has experience in Brand and Product Marketing, as well as the non-profit sector. Elihu is a Bay Area, CA native currently residing in Atlanta, and holds an MBA from Emory University's Goizueta Business School.
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
